      • choosePoints

        public void choosePoints(Vertex v,
                MouseEvent e)
        Chooses points for merging.
        Parameters:
        v - Chosen vertex.
        e - MouseEvent. On left button choose points from polygon #1. On right button choose points from polygon #2.

      • joinPolygons

        public void joinPolygons()
        Merges polygons at chosen points.

      • chooseColorByPoint

        public Color chooseColorByPoint(Vertex point)
        Decides what color should the vertex be represented as. Points that await to be connected with other vertex are colored magenta.
        Overrides:
        chooseColorByPoint in class MouseInput
        Parameters:
        point - Specific vertex
        Returns:
        Color of the vertex.
